name: Kouzuki Hiyori
text: [Activate: Main] You may rest 1 DON!! card and this Character: If your Leader is [Roronoa Zoro], look at the top 5 cards of your deck, reveal up to 1 <Slash> attribute card or a green Event card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest to the bottom of your deck in any order.
